*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Bernado*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-17-1827"> Sept 17 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*on settlement I have fallen in debt to *person_mentioned*Thos. F. McKinney*/person_mentioned* twelve Spanish mares for which he has called on me he is leaving the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and I am not prepared at present to meet the demand in consequence of which I have taken the liberty of soliciting of you the favour of discharging the demand for me by letting him have the number above mentioned of mares for which you shall be amply satisfied in a short time either by having the mares replaced or paid for in any good property your compliance will releave a *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned* of a considerable burden which otherwise he can not be relieved from at this particularly important time and place me under lasting obligations*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jesse Thompson*/person_mentioned* X his mark*/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr. James B. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Philipe*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Received from *person_mentioned*Jas. E. B. Austin */person_mentioned*Twelve Spanish Mares furnished by *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*on account of *person_mentioned*Jesse Thompson*/person_mentioned* of*location_mentioned* Austins Colony-*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-19-1827">19 Septr. 1827*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Thos. F. McKinney */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
